title: Tesla Shareholders Didn’t Approve of Investment in Musk’s xAI
description: A Tesla Inc. shareholder proposal for the board to authorize an investment in xAI wasn’t approved, clouding prospects for the Elon Musk-led carmaker to take a stake in his artificial intelligence startup.
content:
A Tesla Inc. shareholder proposal for the board to authorize an investment in xAI wasn’t approved, clouding prospects for the Elon Musk-led carmaker to take a stake in his artificial intelligence startup.

title: India's data centre capacity set to grow 5x to 8GW by 2030: Jefferies
description: India's data centre capacity is expected to expand fivefold to 8GW by 2030, propelled by rising data consumption, growing cloud adoption, regulatory data localisation requirements, and increasing deployment of artificial intelligence (AI), according to the sectoral update by Jefferies.
content: New Delhi [India], November 8 (ANI): India's data centre capacity is expected to expand fivefold to 8GW by 2030, propelled by rising data consumption, growing cloud adoption, regulatory data localisation requirements, and increasing deployment of art... [2090 chars]

title: OpenAI Asks US To Expand Chips Tax Credit To AI Data Centers
description: OpenAI has asked the Trump administration to revamp a Chips Act tax credit to help lower the cost of artificial intelligence infrastructure, as the startup explores additional ways the US government can support an industrywide data center build-out for AI.

title: Nasdaq posts worst week since April amid AI rally jitters, US yields slip
description: Indian markets saw a dip mirroring global trends. The Nasdaq experienced its largest weekly fall since April due to concerns over artificial intelligence stock sustainability. U.S. Treasury yields also declined. China's trade data showed the impact of tariffs. Bitcoin saw a weekly decline but gained on the day. Major U.S. indexes recovered some losses late in the session.

title: 'Pluribus' Credits Note Show "Was Made By Humans"
description: As artificial intelligence becomes less discernible and more prevalent, Vince Gilligan is setting an example about transparency with 'Pluribus'.
content:

title: A reality check for India's AI crypto rally
description: The rapid rise in AI-linked tokens reflects investor enthusiasm for the fusion of artificial intelligence and blockchain, but questions remain about long-term value.
content:
A surge of interest in artificial intelligence has spilled over into India’s cryptocurrency markets, where tokens tied to AI-driven blockchain projects have emerged as investor favourites.

title: Experts, lawmakers sound alarm on AI in mental health care
